summary: "Legally Blonde" is a 2001 comedy movie about Elle Woods, a blonde sorority girl played by Reese Witherspoon. Elle goes to Harvard Law School to win back her ex-boyfriend and proves that blondes can be successful lawyers. The film is based on a true story and became very popular, making over $141 million. It led to a sequel, a spin-off, and a musical. A third movie is planned but has been delayed.
title: Legally Blonde
